sn46.33:1.1: “Pancime, bhikkhave, jatarupassa upakkilesa, yehi upakkilesehi upakkilittham jatarupam na ceva mudu hoti na ca kammaniyam, na ca pabhassaram pabhangu ca, na ca samma upeti kammaya.
sn46.33:1.3: Ayo, bhikkhave, jatarupassa upakkileso, yena upakkilesena upakkilittham jatarupam na ceva mudu hoti na ca kammaniyam, na ca pabhassaram pabhangu ca, na ca samma upeti kammaya.
sn46.33:1.4: Loham, bhikkhave, jatarupassa upakkileso, yena upakkilesena upakkilittham jatarupam …pe…
sn46.33:1.7: sajjhu, bhikkhave, jatarupassa upakkileso, yena upakkilesena upakkilittham jatarupam na ceva mudu hoti na ca kammaniyam, na ca pabhassaram pabhangu ca, na ca samma upeti kammaya.
sn46.33:1.8: Ime kho, bhikkhave, panca jatarupassa upakkilesa, yehi upakkilesehi upakkilittham jatarupam na ceva mudu hoti na ca kammaniyam, na ca pabhassaram pabhangu ca, na ca samma upeti kammaya.
sn46.33:2.1: Evameva kho, bhikkhave, pancime cittassa upakkilesa, yehi upakkilesehi upakkilittham cittam na ceva mudu hoti na ca kammaniyam, na ca pabhassaram pabhangu ca, na ca samma samadhiyati asavanam khayaya.
sn46.33:2.3: Kamacchando, bhikkhave, cittassa upakkileso, yena upakkilesena upakkilittham cittam na ceva mudu hoti na ca kammaniyam, na ca pabhassaram pabhangu ca, na ca samma samadhiyati asavanam khayaya …pe…
sn46.33:2.4: ime kho, bhikkhave, panca cittassa upakkilesa, yehi upakkilesehi upakkilittham cittam na ceva mudu hoti na ca kammaniyam, na ca pabhassaram pabhangu ca, na ca samma samadhiyati asavanam khayaya”ti.
